title: FeedQUAC: Quick Unobtrusive AI-Generated Commentary
authors: Tao Long, Kendra Wannamaker, Jo Vermeulen, George Fitzmaurice, Justin Matejka
description: FeedQUAC delivers ambient, read-aloud commentary from personas via shortcut keys and auditory cues.

title: DoubleAgents: AI Agents for Task Execution and Evaluation in Human Coordination Problems
authors: Tao Long*, Xuanming Zhang*, Sitong Wang, Arav Dhoot, Zhou Yu, Lydia Chilton
description: DoubleAgents helps users co-establish and execute policies, evaluated via simulated test cases.

title: Not Like Us, Hunty: Measuring Perceptions and Behavioral Effects of Minoritized Anthropomorphic Cues in LLMs
authors: Jeffrey Basoah, Daniel Chechelnitsky, Tao Long, Katharina Reinecke, Chrysoula Zerva, Kaitlyn Zhou, Mark Díaz, Maarten Sap
description: A study with 985 participants reveals sociolect-infused LLMs nfluence trust, reliance, and social presence.

title: Not Just Novelty: A Longitudinal Study on Utility and Customization of an AI Workflow
authors: Tao Long, Katy Gero, Lydia Chilton
description: A 3-week longitudinal study showing a familiarization phase and increasesd AI usefulness through customization.

title: Facilitating Longitudinal Research in HCI
authors: Tao Long, Sitong Wang, Julien Porquet, Yue Jiang, Jason Wu, Tuhin Chakrabarty, Savvas Petridis, David Ledo, Ding Li, Lydia Chilton
status: Workshop Proposal
status1: 14-week Deployment
description: A workshop to facilitate discussion and advance research on long-term user studies in HCI.
description1: A 14-week study shows creators treated AI as an unquestioned expert, accepting flaws.

title: Generative Disco: Text-to-Video for Music Visualization
authors: Vivian Liu, Tao Long, Jenny Ma, Nathan Raw, Lydia Chilton
description: Generates music videos from text prompts using LLMs and text-to-image models, with controllable transitions.

title: ReelFramer: Human-AI Co-Creation for News-to-Video Translation
authors: Sitong Wang, Samia Menon, Tao Long, Keren Henderson, Ding Li, Kevin Crowston, Mark Hansen, Jeffrey Nickerson, Lydia Chilton
description: ReelFramer supports news video generation through framings, storyboards, and scripts using LLMs.

title: Social Dynamics of AI Support in Creative Writing
authors: Katy Gero, Tao Long, Lydia Chilton
description: We identify social-technical gaps in AI-assisted writing, focused on motivation, planning, and user values.

title: Tweetorial Hooks: Generative AI Tools to Motivate Science on Social Media
authors: Tao Long, Dorothy Zhang, Grace Li, Batool Taraif, Samia Menon, Kynnedy Smith, Sitong Wang, Katy Gero, Lydia Chilton
description: HookIncubator helps STEM experts co-create compelling hooks for Twitter threads using LLM scaffolding.

title: Challenges and Opportunities for the Design of Smart Speakers
description: Identifies VUI design opportunities: multitasking, calm design, and mental models.

title: Audience Impressions of Narrative Structures and Personal Language Style in Science Communication
authors: Grace Li, Yuanyang Teng, Juna Kawai-Yue, Unaisah Ahmed, Anatta Tantiwongse, Jessica Y. Liang, Dorothy Zhang, Kynnedy Simone Smith, Tao Long, Mina Lee, Lydia Chilton
description: Social media techniques boost science engagement, but preferences and scientist comfort levels vary widely.

title: Perspectives from Participants and Researchers on Addressing Embodiment in a Virtual Cyberball Task
authors: Tao Long, Swati Pandita, Andrea Won
description: Discusses naive participants and researchers’ perspectives on designing inclusive VR studies.

title: Multi-stakeholder Perspectives on Digital Tools for U.S. Asylum Applicants Seeking Healthcare and Legal Information
authors: Aparajita Bhandari, Diana Freed, Tara Pilato, Faten Taki, Gunisha Kaur, Stephen Yale-Loehr, Jane Powers, Tao Long, Natalie Bazarova
description: Analyzes digital tool barriers for asylum applicants seeking healthcare/legal info.
